website_summaries.verdict: For those looking for high-value when it comes to overnight lip masks, this 3-pack of an effective mask cannot be beat in price.
pros: Doesn’t feel sticky on lips and makes them plump and well-hydrated
Can pass as lip gloss if worn during the day
Can be used over lipstick for hydration and shine
cons: Dries quicker on lips than competing products

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy "😍😀
customer_reviews.text: Very soft on the lips, shiny and moist. I compare with Laneige that I bought in Indonesia and there is no difference. the quality and benefits are the same. I'm happy "😍😀
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Ester Goolsbee

customer_reviews.title: Be Mindful
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to read about a product that could help my chapped lips. Immediately after purchasing the product I applied the gloss when I went to sleep. The first night I couldn’t tell Amy difference (as most products) take time to work. I diligently followed directions and applied this product to my lips for two weeks. I still couldn’t see a difference in improvement. However- Right at the two week mark-my lips became VERY infected! So bad that I was embarrassed to go anywhere. I had to place ice packs on my lips and take medicine for seven days until the infection left.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. Deal

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely wonderful. My lips for the first time in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally started using this product as a lip mask at night, but have started using it as a chapstick night and day. It is absolutely wonderful. My lips for the first time in my life are not cracked and bleeding and I don't have to constantly reapply chapstick to no avail. In my opinion, this is a miracle product and I will be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked overnight, not sticky or gummy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Laniege sleep mask for a couple years, but it went up in price, so I found this and decided to give it a try. I am super impressed! Way less sticky than other lip masks, but stayed on all night and my lips were softer after one night! I especially love the lime one. I wish there were two of those and one strawberry instead!
customer_reviews.author: LittleSeaStar

customer_reviews.title: No down sides, this stuff is the business!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! The jars are about the size of carmex jars, so three of them will last a long time. I use it at night, but I also use it during the day, it's a great lip balm for any time. I've tried so many lip products, and this treatment is in my top three (that is saying a lot for me)! My lips are always soft and hydrated, I will never be without this product, as long as they continue to make it.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I already love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I already love this stuff. I was looking for something ultra moisturizing to leave on my lips as a mask at home..I couldn't stop putting this stuff on. I'm really happy I took a chance on this stuff because it's cheap, it works great, and there's 3 included! I'm thinking of using the other two to share with my mom and sister, but that's less for me so we'll see lol. I've spent so much money on high end brands, trying to find the best products..dior, clinique, origins, YSL, Bite, Lush, Aveda, etc. I truly think this product beats any of the more expensive ones I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Thick and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Just received and immediately applied to my lips. The thick texture of the mask, coupled with the faint strawberry scent gave me high hopes. I immediately noticed the difference once I applied to my lips. My lips feel extremely moisturized and plump. I wanted to try the Laneige mask but couldn’t stomach the price for a lip product. So glad I tried this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mboa

customer_reviews.title: Drying. Not sealed. No applicator.
customer_reviews.text: It says on the directions you are to apply with the “provided applicator” yet there isn’t one. The small pink box was not sealed in any way. None of the 3 jars had any seal to prove it to be new and safe to use. This was all incredibly disappointing. I used an applicator from another lip mask I had as the described applicator was not there . When I take it off my lips don’t feel super moisturized or smooth. They actually feel dry. And there is a gooy residue in the morning. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: just like laneige 🖤
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because i heard that it was a dupe for the laneige lip sleeping mask, and it 100% is!! basically the same scene and texture, and it moisturizes just as well overnight. I love both products, but will buy this one moving forward because it’s so much more affordable!
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: B2+A has 1 face mask!
customer_reviews.text: B2+A combo includes 2 berry lip masks and a very small aqua face mask. I wish I’d read more clearly and gotten the 3 lip mask combo with lime (MY fault). That being said, the package arrived in a week (not available for speedy Prime delivery). The three cane in the box shown, no problem with leaks or breaks. Products themselves are so similar to the big L brand. Consistency is great. Stays on lips well. Softer lips in the morning. Small size makes them easy to carry. All around win.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy456

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I got the pack with 2 berry and one lime. The lime one smells really really good. So far I've only used the lime one but when I wake up I still have it on my lips, unlike normal lip balms/ chap sticks. So you know its working all night. And my lips aren't quite as textured as they were before. I haven't tried the laneige one but this has to be a good dupe cause I really like it. And I'm really picky with lip products. Oh also it doesn't taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alera

customer_reviews.title: It smell good, no taste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible! It smell good, no taste, thick and velvety, stays on all night and leaves my lips smoother than they ever were. I even wear a tiny bit over my lipstick in the morning and it last almost through lunch, just because I love the way it makes my lips feel. A tiny bit goes a long way. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Laneige on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Works and feels exactly like Laneige lip mask but 1/6 the price- my only complaint is the synthetic berry scent- it’s not as pleasant as the Laneige one- smells like strawberry lip smacker lip flip balm- if you weren’t an 80s or early 90s kid you probably won’t know what I mean- but fake strawberry chapstick. Other than the smell it’s bomb- I wish there was another scent like green tea or lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Lip snob
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally plump lips 👄 and love my natural color so I go for sheer color but want Max moisture and in dry weather that is hard to get in a lip balm/gloss.. this is my favorite fav fav fav on my lips!!!! It has a small peach sheer color just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price, size and convenience!
customer_reviews.text: I have the high end version of this product and I would say, the feel, texure and application are exactly the same as the brand name one. However, the higher end version one works better in actually moisturizing and healing the chapped lips. However, for the price and convenience, these are phenomenal. Better than the average drugstore lipbalms.
customer_reviews.author: AnnS

customer_reviews.title: Not A Dupe
customer_reviews.text: It's decent. Nothing like the other well known lip sleeping mask in similar packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Delightful Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Not just a chapstick!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a lip mask for awhile now and tried this. It’s super moisturizing without being sticky or runny. I apply it in the morning and evening and have soft lips all day, otherwise I would have to apply chapstick every 30 minutes. I am really impressed with this, especially at the price point. My husband can use it as well, so it’s not overly pigmented. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Usually fantastic. Got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.text: Normally this would be 5 stars. I've ordered this multiple. The berry ones were fantastic but the lime one is trash worthy. I was happy to stick to berry though and i use it all throughout the day. Unfortunately the last set i recieved smelled a little different... i have tried all 3 in the set and they taste like vile chemicals. They also caused mild burning. I have no choice but to trash it. Its cheap enough that i may just try ordering it again to see if it was a fluke. But buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: heather carter

customer_reviews.title: Best for extremely dry lips!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! You’re getting a good deal for the price. I have extremely dry lips even though I drink a lot of water. I used to wake up in the morning with painfully dry lips even though I applied Vaseline before going to be. Now, I use this lip mask every night and I wake up to slightly supple lips which is a miracle. I will say the formula isn’t sheer on skin of color but that doesn’t bother me since I’m just going to sleep and also it is a bit sticky but I wash it off in the morning. Overall, I think it’s great and will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Holy grail lip product.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern Nevada where the climate is extremely dry, I struggle with dry chapped lips as it is but to top it off I just got home from 8 days of camping in dry and windy conditions and this is the only product that has soothed my lips. The scent is very subtle, it's very soothing and the consistency is perfect. Thick enough to provide some lasting power but still has enough slip to feel really smooth and not waxy like chapstick. Totally recommend this. I will never be without it. I also appreciated the packaging and Will be gifting these in the future as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing and the formula is creamy and luxurious. But when I wake up in the morning, my lips don’t feel as moisturized as they would have been with my regular chapstick. Ive used it for about a week and my lips are on the border of soft but teetering to dry. I think I’d rather use it during the day time because it adds a hint of color and plenty of shine and stick to my chapstick for overnight wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Lip saver
customer_reviews.text: This is really great! I have sever dry lips. No matter how much lip balm is applied, or increase my water intake. This has helped so much. I put on a generous layer before bed and when I wake up, my lips are very soft. Might need to do a light exfoliation of there's excess dead skin, but great over all. If you're sensitive to scents, the berry (pink container) might smell a bit artificial. Only thing that's a bit annoying is that I have to dig my finger in the container every time I want to apply. It would be nice if a small brush came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lovely doupe
customer_reviews.text: Super moisturizing and not sticky at all. A sheer semi matte light gloss. Light berry fragrance. amazing quality and wonderful price for 3!
customer_reviews.author: Miss.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with just one night’s use
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so first and foremost I won’t lie; at first I was disappointed. Not in the product itself but the size of the product as I was expecting something much bigger. However, I will admit that was my fault for not paying attention to the measurements in the description box. So far I’ve only used it one night but I already see MAJOR improvements. I was desperate because of how chapped my lips were. I tried everything, from coconut oil to Vaseline and even homemade lip scrubs. Nothing gave me as good results as this has in one use. Yes they maybe small but you get 3 in total and a little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! This stuff is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!!! This stuff is great! I came on here looking for an inexpensive dupe of the Laneige Lip Mask. I was tired of paying $20 so I ordered this one. THIS STUFF IS BETTER THAN MY $20 Laneige & it comes with 3! I love the size and it fits in my makeup bag. I actually plan on using it as my daily lip balm since it's so inexpensive I don't have to be stingy with it. Will definitely continue to purchase going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Posh2wice

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the higher priced brand. I have both and they sit next to each other on my dresser. I pick up either one to use and cannot tell the difference. IMO seems to work the same. This feels very nice and moisturizing on your lips for a short time, but does not last all night.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make any difference
customer_reviews.text: This lip cream didn't make any difference at all. I've been using this cream for almost 2 weeks andmy lips are still cracky. It feels like it's moisturizing for the first few hours but in the long run it doesn't make any difference. You can use vaseline for that sense too.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about a month every night and I’m really not impressed. My lips are still dry in the morning and by the end of the day they’re chapped and red. It’s good for the price as a lipgloss but otherwise I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: ooooopanda

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: I got this mask for all the hype around it and wasn’t disappointed. I had a dry spot on my lips and before I knew it the spot was soft and I had nice lips again. It doesn’t just glob on and sit oily on the dry spot like a lip balm it will actually soak in.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear276

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very sensitive on my face so I was worried about trying these. They work great! I keep one in my purse for light daily use and sometimes put it in over night. I'll be getting more for stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: N. Helderlein

customer_reviews.title: A miracle in a little jar!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I suffer from super sensitive lips that get so chapped they bleed. Not only is this product the first to work but I noticed a difference after just one night! By night three my lips were healed. It also smells great!! Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters lips are constantly chap. She has redness that never really goes away. She wore this to bed last night and woke up today and it was almost gone!! She wants this for everybag she owns so she always has it!
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every night for months now. Before then my lips were really chapped and I would have to reapply chapstick every five minutes. Now my lips are softer, smoother, and (according to my former S.O.) much more kissable. And I haven’t even made it halfway through the first pot! This is a product that truly delivers and I something that I would recommend for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: Not for overnight use
customer_reviews.text: WANT to love this product, but it’s certainly not an overnight lip mask. It’s more like a thick lip gloss. It smells great and is shiny, but I’d say it lasts no more than 45 before needing to reapply
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Waters

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: It's a little less thick than Vaseline, but smells and tastes and whole lot better. Since I've been using this, my lips are no longer cracked or chapped. I even bought a few to give to my girlfriends to try because I like this so much.
customer_reviews.author: Robin McGann

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I happened to get a sample of the Laniege a couple of days after I got this. This works fine. The real stuff is better. It’s a little thicker and goopier than the real stuff and it almost burns/stings a little. But it is moisturizing. If I hadn’t tried the other I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: You will LOVE It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a couple nights now. I like it, a lot. You do have to re-apply it through the night. It’s not sticky at all, which I love. The smell & taste are not an issue, there both great! Highly recommend!!! *Please dis-regard any prior feedback* Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Brueggen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DUPE  FOR THE LANEIGE SLEEPING  PACK1
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DUPE FOR THE LANEIGE LIP SLEEPING MASK . THE TEXTURES ARE A BUT DIFFERENT BUT THE RESULTS A VERY SIMILAR AND THIS PRODUCT IS CHEAPER I LIKE TO THROW ONE IN MY TRAVEL BAG AND ITS MY LIP BALM FOR ON THE PLANE ITS VERY HYDRATIING
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Started using as chapstick
customer_reviews.text: These little guys have lasted quite some time (maybe a year?) and they are still fine to use. They are ULTRA moisturising and can turn chapped lips to normal within a day. I've been using this as a normal chapstick due to how wonderful my lips feel. It's a bit sticky but nothing unlike a lip gloss. Adds shine like one too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty comparable to the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask. It doesn't last quite as long, but it is significantly less expensive so I think it's a better value. It has a pleasant berry scent and doesn't just leave a heavy layer of wax on your lips like most balms do. I actually really like that it comes in many small jars so I can have one at work, home, and in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! I have tried so many products to get some relief from my lips that peel all winter. This product goes on smoothly and stays on. I was also able to apply some lip color on top without it being too thick looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Definitely a time when the reviews matched perfectly! I am in love with this stuff! The smell is amazing, it’s not greasy or thick or stick. It’s perfect and it actually works! Woke up with smoother lips! Also- put it on for my run outside in the cold and it protected me from the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Katiekate

customer_reviews.title: Lip mask
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff! It heals my dry lips over night! I was skeptical when I first bought it because my lips are always dry but this actually works for me I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Best beauty product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever. I am a lip chewer and not only does this help make my lips smooth while sleeping, it actually has caused me to cut down on the lip chewing because they’re so smooth it’s now hard for me to do! I am sad if I forget this product at night. You won’t be disappointed. Very nice pleasant scent to the product as well!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it does not make lips lighter shade
customer_reviews.text: * After religiously using it for 3 weeks straight: morning & nighttime ( it’s winter where I’m at) and I have combination skin, I can say that the: PROS: -Light Scent -Compact/Travel Size - comes in 3: one for home, one for makeup bag, and one in the car -can be used throughout day, but mainly for night CONS: -Does not make Lips Light Pink/Lighter in Lip Shade -feels Very Glossy instead of Hydrating; feel like I’m wearing lipgloss -slightly sticky feeling
customer_reviews.author: KUHINOOR

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: Would really like to give this a higher rating...feels nice, looks nice, smells nice. Even priced nice. Problem? Had to stop using when it began to cause tiny blisters. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Vesta

customer_reviews.title: My lips have never been so smooth...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for 3! Extremely moisturizing for my chapped and cracked lips. I've been applying this lip mask every day and night for about a month now and my lips are oh so smooth. It does not irritate my lips at all. It has a very glossy effect. The only downside is that it does not come with an applicator. I usually use a q-tip to apply the product. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Leeloo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it honestly
customer_reviews.text: Made my lips drier after every use i should of just stuck to laniege i was just trying to be cheap haha. But rn im using Aquaphor lip therapy with spf30. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Reine

customer_reviews.title: Best  buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've ever bought!!! I'm a horrible bottom lip chewer/bitter. This makes a huge difference. Love the feel and scent. I wear daily as logos. Guys even love the color. The smell is so yummy
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pink starburst!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product is very hydrating in a non greasy way for my lips. I can use this as a lip balm during the day or as an intense moisturizer cream for my lips at night. I can even use this as a balm on my eyelids and it heals my dry eyelids! It smells wonderful and it lasts forever. Great value and great light strawberry scent!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle My lips WERE the most ugly chapped pale lips you could have ever seen and I received this product by morning and immediately used it because I couldn’t wait for night and I can’t believe what happened to my lips... my lips were transformed I wish I had a before picture to show you how ugly it was and how this product made it perfect in one day... I gave my mom one too and I will DEFINITELY buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Joy botros

customer_reviews.title: Bad allergy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I get a strong inflammatory reaction from night one. My lips are hot and very itchy. Hard to know the ingredients because it’s of course a foreign language.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinology

customer_reviews.title: One of THE best lipcare products. Affordable and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple of days, this product started to show results. I applied a few coats on my lip overnight and the next morning my lips already felt smoother and supple. I have a terrible habit of picking the dead skin on my lips constantly and have dry lips to begin with. This product has done wonders. Don’t spend your money on countless lip products. This one is affordable, efficient and worthy. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Aamir ratnani

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from dry, cracked lips all year. Partly due to the weather, but also the fact that I wear lipstick/stains almost every day and it takes a toll on your skin. I have had this for 1 day, and it is wonderful! In 1 day my lips have gone from cracked & chapped to smooth. This product has great reviews, and I see why! I was hesistant about having to put the product on with my finger as other products like this can be very messy. But this is not mess or greasy at all. Easy application.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: For a price, THIS IS REALLY GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had dry lips for forever and these really helped! My lips aint dry anymore and the fact that I got three was amazing. So, I gave one for my sister and one for my boyfriend :)
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase Laneige lip mask!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this product after watching a review on YouTube that this was a dupe for the Laneige sleeping lip mask. They have the exactly same ingredient but in different order I believe. Im so happy with this product. I put this on before I start my makeup and by the time I finish my face I wipe this off and my liquid lipstick apply fantastic! Makes my lips very soft! Will forever purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brigida Arias

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my lips moisturized and feeling good!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this lip mask. From the moment I put it on, my lips feel better. I use it as an overnight lip mask and I wake up feeling great with no dryness in my lips. It definitely looks like a gloss and has a light pink tint to it. As a guy, I don't feel comfortable wearing it outside of the house, but I'll definitely continue to use it overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lip sleeping mask ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip sleeping mask ever. Keeps my lips so smooth and the smell is great. No smell of snails or anything. I highly recommend for people with dry lips. I use it for daytime as well.
customer_reviews.author: HHN

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the other more expensive laneige brand. Both feel identical. I liked that this came with 3 small bottles so i could put one by my bed, One in my purse and one in my bathroom makeup drawer. It’s so dry where i live during the winter this is the best stuff for lips!! Ordering more for friend gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Karley Root

customer_reviews.title: Affordable product with high end performance!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I took a chance on this because I loved the Laneige lip sleeping mask, which it reminds me a lot of, but with better consistency and staying power. Hydrates and keeps my lips looking healthy. It’s also a reasonable price for a pack of 3!
customer_reviews.author: Cam and Niña

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this more as a chapstick during the day but it definitely keeps my lips feeling soft! The three containers will last you forever! Awesome value for money
customer_reviews.author: Allison Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very good! You apply a small amount overnight and your lips are smooth and soft the nect morning throughtout the day! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this item one star because when I received it there are only two containers of the lip mask in the box it came in, instead of three as advertised. There was nothing wrong with the shipping envelope, so the product was missing from the box when it was shipped to me. I have been unable to get in touch with anyone to help me, which is incredibly disappointing. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schiavi

customer_reviews.title: Good for day and night
customer_reviews.text: These can be used at night or during the day. Love the pretty tint it leaves and makes my lips feel so soft. A little goes a long way as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Use this every night to help keep my lips from getting chapped and I have been successful with this product so far
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love how it feels
customer_reviews.text: I used it at night the first night and the next morning my lips felt very soft. The smell is incredible! It says it comes with an applicator, but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A. Bultman-Herman

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask but for the price I thought I would try these. Wear it every night and works pretty good, not quite as thick as Laneige but pretty darn close. I wake up with product still on so still a nice thickness to it
customer_reviews.author: pixied

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Product came so quick! This product is a steal! Especially for the price you pay for 3 containers, kept 1 and gave 2 to friends as a great gift! They also love the product! The only thing is that i wish the berry scent was a bit stronger, bc it almost smells like nothing. But still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these instead of laniege. Not sure that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these instead of laniege. Not sure that is really making much of a difference, but it definitely feels nourishing.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: My lips are SO soft. LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. So much cheaper than the 'name brand' and my lips look and feel awesome. Great for the dry winter months!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lip mask
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisturizing & silicone-like qualities it provides to your lips! I had sunburnt lips & it fixed it overnight!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Stieferman

customer_reviews.title: Stays on lips good.
customer_reviews.text: The feel of it on lips is great. Stays on for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night after I brush my teeth and exfoliate my lips, and it really keeps them soft and moisturized for hours. It smells kinda like roses and they last a long while because you don't need much. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Laneige lip mask much better option
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok but if we are comparing to the very similar Laneige lip mask, just spend the extra money. The texture of this kind of feels like regular Vaseline and there is little to no scent. The Laneige lip mask has a creamier texture and lovely scent. This is definitely a great copycat at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: jturib

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you get a lot of product. I try to use it every night. I wake up with the softest lips. Really works!! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good dupe for the Laneige mask
customer_reviews.text: It has small glitters in it and smells different from the Laneige lip mask. You can also see the color difference even though I'm running low on my Laneige. It is also not as moisturizing, feels tight and drying on my lips. I would rather spend the extra money to get a full size Laneige lip mask
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying!
customer_reviews.text: I would compare this Lip mask to Laneige’s. It has worked wonder for my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Heylee

customer_reviews.title: No more cracked lips
customer_reviews.text: My lips were so awful chapped this winter until using this. I slathered it in before bed and woke up to beautiful lips. Soooo pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tessaj30

customer_reviews.title: Miracle lip balm.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm I had. It works like a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanblue2001

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product rehydrates your lips at night. Also adds a subtle shine during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christ

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and as advertised. It’s just like a lip balm. I guess it hydrates ok. Don’t think I’ll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bkitty13

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Great for a sleek lip balm but don't expect too much color. Lasts for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: XX

customer_reviews.title: Soft  Lips
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many champ sticks and none of them work but this Product is great
customer_reviews.author: vanessa mullins

customer_reviews.title: Good moisutre, but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. I keep one by the bed, one in the bathroom, and one in my purse. Good moisture, but not really sure how it works as a sleeping mask because it soaks in very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a weird lip rash not sure what chemicals are in this product
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: No seal??
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to trying this but the box arrived open and there aren’t seals on any of the lip balms. Did anyone’s come sealed?
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Small, but good
customer_reviews.text: I definitely should have read product reviews more, because they are TINY. But they are super moisturizing so, it's okay. Maybe lower the price tho....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Made my lips feel soft and healthy. Definitely buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use thsi product similar to an everyday chapstick and it’s works great. This is the second time ordering.. got some friends hooked and had to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy & Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this lip mask! My daughter had such bad chapped lips they were like bleeding, cold weather does that to her as well as mommy, but used one night and she woke up and her lips looked so much better and she told me “mommy they don’t hurt anymore “ Would recommend to anyone with bad lips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for high end Laneige lip mask
customer_reviews.text: My lips are so soft and it has that universal scent that everybody loves ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Nodira

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!! No seal
customer_reviews.text: I am really concerned about the product now. I bought it looking at the reviews. But when I got the product, there was no seal. Neither in the box nor in any of those small balms. Now I am skeptical whether to use it or throw it away. Never going to buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: JayashreeB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Its creamy, has no flavor or smell and very moisturizing but I haven't tried it overnight yet
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing lip balm. Nice, natural color with subtle pink tint. Goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: I have a really bad habit of biting my lips
customer_reviews.text: I have a really bad habit of biting my lips. So, they tend to be chapped a lot. I used this product one time, and the next day I could see a huge difference. So far, I’ve been using this for about a week now, and my lips are so soft, and they look so healthy! I still continue to bite my lips, but it doesn’t seem to hinder the product. My lips are still soft and healthy. I’m so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: It’s just lipgloss people! it lasts two seconds
customer_reviews.text: Ummm...it’s lipgloss that lasts 30 seconds. FAIL. But name brand. hahah
customer_reviews.author: macmamma25

customer_reviews.title: Lip gloss or lip masks?
customer_reviews.text: Love these lip masks. But they are kind of like lip glosses.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: very similar to laneige
customer_reviews.text: looove this! very similar to laneige, keeps my lips moisturized and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I received a sample of the Laneige and I have to say this stuff is better. It seems a little thicker and lasts so much longer on my lips. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: S.lars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This lip treatment is amazing! I suffer from constant chapped lips, but since I have been using this treatment at night, my lips have been super soft. I keep one by my bed, in my purse, and at work. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Prescher
